node.html:
Worked as a teaching assistant for the following courses:

  • Introduction to Computer Science, Fall '17
  • Algorithms and Data Structures, Spring '18
  • Machine Learning, Spring '19 (head TA)

Spent three summer internships working for Bloomberg LP. Worked on different machine learning projects with financial derivatives.

Worked in London 2018, in New York 2019, in London 2020.
Worked in the DELPHI research group at CMU on epidemiological forecasting using machine learning methods.
Worked part-time during the semester and full-time during the summer break as a software developer on cross-platform mobile applications.
